description: This file provides utility functions for Base64 encoding, including an encoding function that accepts raw data and an overload for std::string. It defines constants for standard and URL-safe Base64 alphabets and performs encoding in a straightforward manner.

methods.name: std::string Base64Encode(const std::string & s,bool urlSafe=false)
methods.description: Encodes raw data to a Base64 string, with optional URL-safe encoding.

methods.name: std::string Base64Encode(const void * data,std::size_t len,bool urlSafe=false)
methods.description: Overloaded function to Base64 encode a std::string directly.

ctags.name: Base64Encode
ctags.pattern: /^        std::string Base64Encode(const std::string &s, bool urlSafe = false)$/

ctags.name: Base64Encode
ctags.pattern: /^        std::string Base64Encode(const void *data, std::size_t len, bool urlSafe = false)$/
